org.openehealth.ipf.platform.camel.ihe.mllp.core

Class MllpAuditStrategy<T extends org.openehealth.ipf.commons.ihe.hl7v2.atna.MllpAuditDataset>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openehealth.ipf.platform.camel.ihe.mllp.core.MllpAuditStrategy<T>

  • public abstract class MllpAuditStrategy<T extends org.openehealth.ipf.commons.ihe.hl7v2.atna.MllpAuditDataset>
extends Object
    ATNA audit strategy base for MLLP-based transactions. This strategy is accompanied with a dedicated subclass of MllpAuditDataset containing the data for the audit record.
    Author:
    Dmytro Rud
